item.description:
Let's go out to a nice Italian dinner at Capri before going to Blue Ocean to see the Comedy Hypnotist.

We will meet at Capri, which is across the street from Blue Ocean Hall.  We can have a nice relaxing dinner, then walk over to Blue Ocean for the show. 

If you are not going to the Hypnotist, you are still welcome to join us for dinner.  If you are attending the hypnotist show, our suggestion is to park in the Blue Ocean Parking lot.  You will not be able to leave your car at Capri for the show.

 

If you are attending the Hypnotist show and have not purchased your ticket, please do so quickly as they are selling out fast.

 

Hope to see you all at Capri

 

Donna & janet
item.name: Dinner at Capri
